metadata.title: USN-5382-1 -- libinput vulnerability
metadata.description: Albin Eldst√•l-Ahrens and Lukas Lamster discovered libinput did not properly handle input devices with specially crafted names. A local attacker with physical access could use this to cause libinput to crash or expose sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5382-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libinput-dev - 1.10.4-1ubuntu0.18.04.3 libinput-bin - 1.10.4-1ubuntu0.18.04.3 libinput10 - 1.10.4-1ubuntu0.18.04.3 libinput-tools - 1.10.4-1ubuntu0.18.04.3 No subscription required
